Title: Resolutely smash the counterrevolutionary revisionist clique of Peng, Lu, Luo and Yang
Designer: Propaganda Group of the Preparatory Office of the Oath-taking Rally to Struggle Against the Peng, Lu, Luo, Yang Counterrevolutionary Revisionist Clique (斗争彭、陆、罗、杨反革命修正主义集团誓师大会筹备处宣传组)
Notes: On December 12, more than 100,000 Rebels held a meeting at the Workers' Stadium in Beijing to struggle against Peng Zhen, Luo Ruiqing, Lu Dingyi and Yang Shankun, accused of being a "counter-revolutionary revisionist group".
